description: People of colour in Russia tell the BBC how racism has affected their lives.
title: Racism in Russia: Stories of prejudice
title_page: Racism in Russia: Stories of prejudice - BBC News
maintext: "Once last year they wouldn't let me into a cafe. The security guard told me, 'You can't come in because last time some African guys came in there was a fight'. What has that got to do with me? I asked. But he wouldn't let me in. I even called the manager, but they just told me I wasn't allowed in.
